I love listening to acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
my nickname is bubblegum.

I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite type of music to listen to?
I love acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
That's great! I love a lot of different types of music but acoustic is usually a good choice.
I agree! It's so relaxing and calm.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Civil Wars, Mumford and Sons, and The Avett Brothers.
I love the Civil Wars too! They're so good. I've never heard of Mumford and Sons or The Avett Brothers, I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're all great bands.
I'm looking forward to it! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to run, pickle eggs, and spend time with my family.
I like to run too! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it. I've never pickled eggs before, but it sounds interesting.
It's really easy to do! You just need some eggs, vinegar, and salt.
I might have to try that sometime. It sounds like a fun activity to do with my family.
It is! They love it.
I'm glad to hear it!
I also like to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I love the mountains.
Me too! They're so peaceful and beautiful.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too
